topics.body:
"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556b373363687227d7c20600#post_556b373363687227d7c20600
Eh, normal day stuff.

[spoiler]1. Waiting for people to get on so I can play a game.

2. It takes forever and I get really tired.

3. Brain fucks up and becomes mentally unstable.

4. Emotions.

5. I start to get both really sad and angry at the same time about the fact that I couldn't accomplish my "goal" for the day before sleeping.

6. Someone gets on and can play, I just pretty much give up and say that I'm too tired to play.
Person then adds that they'll be up for a while.

7. I just answer with "I'll wake up at like, 6 am...".

8. I miss out on opportunities to play with people and have fun. Always. Yay.

9. ???

10. PROFIT[/spoiler]

Spoilered because pathetic.

topics.body:
I'm weird like that, because I feel like if I don't accomplish something I almost force myself not to go to sleep until I collapse because of disappointment.

Probably some mental disorder or something. Wouldn't surprise me. I have everything.

~^Sorry about killing the thread with my negative energy^~
